attributes.action: The Removal of Physiological Advertising, to advertise as it is with no addition
attributes.additional_details: Why are clothes/accessories advertised with "Society Standard" of sexy people. Doing things or being in places of luxury for a financially rich person. The aim is to attach the product to things that are valued to the society. A product should be advertised for what it is, the good/healthy/practical things should be shown. For when we buy a product, we buy it to aid us, Not to buy because the advertisement gave us something that was an illusion.
attributes.background: We are bombarded with advertisement were ever we go in the UK including our homes. I've wondered why food products are advertised with green hills, blue sky, illuminating sun, when the ingredients are far from nature and closer to the laboratory. The aim is to make the product LOOK natural.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
